title: AR urf meawhile....
body:
I see the same beyond broken champions almost every game. 
Also why did nidalee ever get unbanned from urf?

replies.body:
because they slowed the speed of her Q. and it doesn't do much that close up.


You'd have to almost walk into it on purpose to get hit most of the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Ròssy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3Z12xEZT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-04T19:48:20.480+0000)
>
> because they slowed the speed of her Q. and it doesn't do much that close up.
> 
> 
> You'd have to almost walk into it on purpose to get hit most of the time.

Yah but she gets to throw 1000 of them and also can spam her cougar Q which does insane damage.

So? they are easy to dodge.

I assume you made this thread because you had just lost to one right?

> [{quoted}](name=Ròssy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3Z12xEZT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-04T20:45:14.482+0000)
>
> So? they are easy to dodge.
> 
> I assume you made this thread because you had just lost to one right?

I see her in every urf game.
